name: ical-vacation-filter
description: Take an Outlook iCal feed and keep only the out-of-office events

scripts.performance-test:ical-data: clinic doctor --on-port 'node performance-test --scenario icalData' -- node src/index.js
scripts.performance-test:binary-data: clinic doctor --on-port 'node performance-test --scenario binaryData' -- node src/index.js
scripts.performance-test:binary-data-ical-header: clinic doctor --on-port 'node performance-test --scenario binaryDataWithIcalHeader' -- node src/index.js
